name: Designer diaper changing nappy bag RADIO GA GA
description:
Baby Changing Bag  -  Radio Ga Ga
by SWEET MORNING
The story … after another stressful night I looked into my baby’s bed and it gave me a big smile
what a sweet morning… www. sweetmorning . de

 Romy Rogotzki the german designer and founder of the new brand Sweet Morning proudly presents her new Mother´s bag „Radio Ga Ga“.

In her parents´time she created the new design, which satisfied all properties of an practical and good looking diaper bag.
The playful outside reminds of a radio with a laughing face. Since each compartment inside offers a pictorial description in the form of an icon label -  no mother will forget anything when grabbing the bag for travelling.

type: diaper bag         design: birds     colour: pebble

Content:
diaper bag with washable changing mat, detachable shoulder strap and clip system for the stroller. ICON LABELs are on all pockets inside the bag - for a better look.

With 22 inside and outside pockets the Radio Ga Ga diaper bag offers plenty of room for various baby utensils. It is larger than normal diaper bags, and is therefore well suited as a diaper bag for twins. The lining is water-resistant and the outer fabric has a laminated inner layer, so that no liquid can be in or out.

It also comes with  2 holders for the stroller. Without changing mat it is undoubtedly an ideal everyday companion even after the age of the wrapping, just because it is so handy inside.

Storage space inside & outside
 

    * 2 insulated flap pockets with velcro fastener for mobile phone and soothers
    * 3 heat insulated bottle pockets
    * 1 strap with karabiner for keys
    * 2 leather loops for pens and a spoon
    * 1 large zipper pocket for clothes or a booklet
    * 2 zipper pockets for tissues and make up
    * 2 large pockets for nappies and wet wipes
    * 1 small pocket for baby cream and medicine


    * zip pocket back side: purse, keys
    * 2 side pockets: drink bottle, toys, sun glasses
    * zip pockets front side: camera, sweets, small coins,...


colour: pebble with allover print (steel blue/coral/navy/grizzly brown)

dimensions: W 60/49 x H 32 x D 15 cm
weight: 1,4 kg (without accessories)

material: 100% CO canvas PVC coating inside, 100% denim, 100% imitation leather, washable bottom with metal feet, inner lining 100% Nylon waterproof

care: Hand wash clean only inside/outside  with a wet towl. Please note these bags are not machine washable.
